tha-ap460:0.3_0: Hermits to the most senior monk.
tha-ap460:1.2_0: among the most excellent of men,
tha-ap460:1.4_0: I cried up with the corpse.
tha-ap460:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rebirth.
tha-ap460:2.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
tha-ap460:3.2_0: having plunged into the whole world,
tha-ap460:3.4_0: I went to the King of Mahāvijita.
tha-ap460:4.1_0: You’ve got over the first month,
tha-ap460:4.3_0: I used to be so pretty,
tha-ap460:4.4_0: because of the most excellent of all beings.
tha-ap460:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap460:7.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap460:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
